original_text: Because thou shalt forget thy misery, and remember it as waters that pass away:
korean_text: 곧 네 환난을 잊을 것이라 네가 기억할지라도 물이 흘러감 같을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Because thou shalt forget thy misery,
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 너의 고통을 잊을 것이기 때문에,

sentences.original_text: and remember it as waters that pass away:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 흘러가는 물처럼 그것을 기억할 것이라:
